text: Sri Hargobindpur Assembly Constituency (Sl. No.: 8) is a Punjab Legislative Assembly constituency in Gurdaspur district, Punjab state, India. ==Member of Legislative Assembly== * 2012: Des Raj Dhugga, Shiromani Akali Dal * 2017: Balwinder Singh Laddi, Indian National Congress ==Election results== ===2017=== ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Punjab, India Category:Gurdaspur district
title: Sri Hargobindpur Assembly Constituency
